(29504, 32445).label: project
(29504, 32445).description: A satellite-derived precipitation product used for comparison with PERSIANN-CDR and CPC gauge data

(29504, 32445).name: CPC gauge data
(29504, 32445).label: project
(29504, 32445).description: A dataset of precipitation measurements from ground-based gauges, used as a reference for evaluating satellite-derived precipitation products

(29504, 32445).name: PERSIANN model
(29504, 32445).label: model
(29504, 32445).description: A satellite-based precipitation estimation model used to produce historical rainfall estimates

(29504, 32445).name: GridSat-B1 IRWIN data
(29504, 32445).label: project
(29504, 32445).description: A dataset of historical infrared satellite data used in the PERSIANN model to produce historical rainfall estimates

(29504, 32445).name: GPCP 2.5° monthly data
(29504, 32445).label: project
(29504, 32445).description: A dataset of monthly precipitation measurements, including GPCC gauge information, used for bias correction in the PERSIANN model

(29504, 32445).name: GPCC gauge information
(29504, 32445).label: project
(29504, 32445).description: A dataset of precipitation measurements from ground-based gauges, used for bias correction in the PERSIANN model

(29504, 32445).name: NOAA NCDC CDR Program
(29504, 32445).label: provider
(29504, 32445).description: A program that provides operational climate data records, including the PERSIANN-CDR product, to the public

(29504, 32445).name: precipitation
(29504, 32445).label: variable
(29504, 32445).description: A measure of the amount of rainfall or other forms of moisture that fall to the ground, used to study trends and observed changes in global and regional precipitation patterns

(31974, 34468).name: PERSIANN-CDR
(31974, 34468).label: project
(31974, 34468).description: A climate data record project that provides high-resolution precipitation data for climate and hydrological research

(31974, 34468).name: NOAA
(31974, 34468).label: provider
(31974, 34468).description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, an American scientific agency focused on the conditions of the oceans, major waterways, and the atmosphere

(31974, 34468).name: NCDC
(31974, 34468).label: provider
(31974, 34468).description: The National Centers for Environmental Information, a division of NOAA that archives and provides access to climate and environmental data

(31974, 34468).name: CPC
(31974, 34468).label: provider
(31974, 34468).description: The Climate Prediction Center, a division of NOAA that provides climate forecasts and warnings

(31974, 34468).name: CHRS
(31974, 34468).label: provider
(31974, 34468).description: The Center for Hydrometeorology and Remote Sensing, a research institution at the University of California, Irvine, focused on hydrology and remote sensing

(31974, 34468).name: University of California, Irvine
(31974, 34468).label: provider
(31974, 34468).description: A public research university in California, with a strong focus on scientific research and education

(31974, 34468).name: NOAA NCDC CDR Program website
(31974, 34468).label: platform
(31974, 34468).description: A website that provides access to climate data records, including the PERSIANN-CDR product

(31974, 34468).name: atmospheric CDRs
(31974, 34468).label: variable
(31974, 34468).description: A type of climate data record that focuses on atmospheric variables

(31974, 34468).name: LEO satellites
(31974, 34468).label: instrument
(31974, 34468).description: Low Earth Orbit satellites, used for remote sensing and environmental monitoring

(31974, 34468).name: GEO satellites
(31974, 34468).label: instrument

(34281, 34468).name: NASA Energy and Water Cycle Study (NEWS) program
(34281, 34468).label: project
(34281, 34468).description: A NASA program focused on understanding the Earth's energy and water cycles, and their impact on the climate system

(34281, 34468).label: project
(34281, 34468).description: A fellowship program provided by NASA to support research in Earth and space science, including climate-related studies

(34281, 34468).name: NASA Decision Support System
(34281, 34468).label: project
(34281, 34468).description: A system developed by NASA to provide decision-making support for climate and environmental applications

(34281, 34468).name: NASA
(34281, 34468).label: provider
